item.description: You are invited to our Pilates, C W, Swing, and Salsa Dance Meet Up party every Sunday night at the Knights of Columbus Hall in Salem Mass. The doors open at 7 to 11 PM for an evening of dance and adventure. Possibly meet up with a special dance partner. An air conditioned 4,000 sq. ft. dance hall is available to our dance group. Casual dress, jeans OK and the admission is $10. Students half price with valid school ID. Beginner class Pilates with Deborah Wilczek at 7 pm and line-partner lessons start at 7:30 pm with Shana Ross. Salsa line-partner lesson at 8:15 pm. with Deborah Wilczek. Private and couples lessons with guest instructors extra charge. Bring lot's of you friends and room for many hundreds of dancers and spectators. Don't miss this great night of Pilates,CW, Swing, Salsa and more. Hope to see you at our next dance Meet Up, Clint Guy
item.name: Aspire, "Pilates, C W, Swing and Salsa" Dance Meet Up
